item.title: How Brain Chemistry Affects Behavior Change
item.description:
How Brain Chemistry Affects Behavior Change

Learn more about The Healthiest You at http://books.simonandschuster.com/Program/Kelly-Traver/9781439109991?mcd=vd_youtube_book Understanding how your brain really works is critical to changing bad habits into healthy ones.

item.title: After a California Earthquake
item.description:
After a California Earthquake

Shortly before the Loma Prieta earthquake devastated areas of Northern California in 1989, Risa Palm and her associates had surveyed 2,500 homeowners in the area about their perception of risk from earthquakes.

item.title: Behavior Change in the Classroom
item.description:
Behavior Change in the Classroom

This book presents practical approaches for designing and implementing self-management interventions in school settings. Rich with detailed instruction, the volume covers the conceptual foundations for the development of self-management from both contingency management and cognitive-behavioral perspectives. It provides detailed descriptions of the various self-management intervention strategies for classroom settings, and extends these techniques for use in home and community environments.
